debates.showAs: Ethical Public Investment (Tobacco) Bill 2017: Second Stage [Private Members]
Ethical Public Investment (Tobacco) Bill 2017: Referral to Select Committee [Private Members]
Ethical Public Investment (Tobacco) Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to prohibit the investment of public moneys directly or indirectly in equity or debt securities issued by tobacco companies
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht dá thoirmeasc airgead poiblí a infheistiú go díreach nó go neamhdhíreach in urrúis chothromais nó i bhfiach-urrúis arna n-eisiúint ag cuideachtaí tobac
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Infheistíocht Phoiblí Eiticiúil (Tobac), 2017

debates.showAs: Health (Pricing and Supply of Medical Goods) (Amendment) Bill 2015: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Health (Pricing and Supply of Medical Goods) Act 2013 to allow interchangeability between biologic and biosimilar medical goods.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta Sláinte (Earraí Liachta a Phraghsáil agus a Sholáthar), 2013 chun inmhalartacht idir earraí liachta bitheolaíocha agus earraí liachta bithchosúla a cheadú .
bill.shortTitleEn: Health (Pricing and Supply of Medical Goods) (Amendment) Bill 2015
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um An Bille Sláinte (Earraí Liachta a Phraghsáil agus a Sholáthar) (Leasú), 2015

debates.showAs: Management Fees (Local Property Tax) Relief Bill 2015: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Management Fees (Local Property Tax) Relief Bill 2015: Second Stage [Private Members]
Management Fees (Local Property Tax) Relief Bill 2015: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Finance (Local Property Tax) Act 2012 to make provision for a partial exemption of property tax payable by a relevant owner whose property is located in a managed estate on which the owner of said property is liable to the payment of management fees and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta Airgeadais (Cáin Mhaoine Áitiúil), 2012 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le díolúine pháirteach i leith cáin mhaoine is iníoctha ag úinéir iomchuí a bhfuil a mhaoin nó a maoin suite in eastát bainistithe a bhfuil úinéir na maoine sin faoi dhliteanas táillí bainistíochta a íoc air agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleEn: Management Fees (Local Property Tax) Relief Bill 2015
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Fhaoiseamh i leith Táillí Bainistíochta (Cáin Mhaoine Áitiúil), 2015

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Water Services Act 2013 to make provision for requiring individual consent to all information provided to the subsidiary
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Sheirbhísí Uisce, 2013 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le ceanglas go bhfaighfear toiliú na pearsan aonair i leith na faisnéise go léir arna soláthar don fhochuideachta

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to reform the method whereby persons are recruited and selected for appointment to State boards; and to ensure that persons of the highest quality are recruited and selected for such appointments
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht d'athchóiriú an mhodha ar a ndéantar daoine a earcú agus a roghnú lena gceapadh ar bhoird Stáit; agus dá chinntiú go ndéanfar daoine den chaighdeán is airde a earcú agus a roghnú le haghaidh ceapacháin den sórt sin

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Ombudsman Act 1980 (as amended) to make provision for the inclusion of Irish Water in the schedule of agencies reviewable by the Ombudsman and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta Ombudsman, 1980 (arna leasú) chun socrú a dhéanamh go n-áireofar Uisce Éireann i sceideal na ngníomhaireachtaí is inathbhreithnithe ag an Ombudsman agus do dheanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara

debates.showAs: Freedom of Information (Amendment) Bill 2014: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Freedom of Information Acts 1997 and 2003 by including EirGrid as a public body covered by the aforesaid Acts
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú na nAchtanna um Shaoráil Faisnéise, 1997 agus 2003 trí EirGrid a áireamh mar chomhlacht poiblí a thiocfaidh faoi réim na nAchtanna réamhráite

debates.showAs: Freedom of Information (Amendment) (No. 2) Bill 2012: Second Stage
Freedom of Information (Amendment) (No. 2) Bill 2012: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the provisions of the Freedom of Information Act 1997 as amended by the Freedom of Information (Amendment) Act 2003 to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú na bhforálacha den Acht um Shaoráil Faisnéise, 1997, arna leasú leis an Acht um Shaoráil Faisnéise (Leasú), 2003, do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara

debates.showAs: Electoral (Amendment) (Political Donations) Bill 2011: Order for Second Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to restrict the making of donations for political purposes by companies, trade unions, societies or building societies, to amend the law relating to the disclosure of donations to political parties and individuals, to provide for the auditing of the accounts of political parties and to implement the recommendations relating to political funding contained within the Second Report of the Tribunal of Inquiry into Payments to Politicians
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do chur srian le cuideachtaí, ceardchumainn, cumainn nó cumainn fhoirgníochta do thabhairt síntiús chun críoch polaitíochta, do leasú an dlí a bhaineann le síntiúis le páirtithe polaitíochta agus le pearsana aonair a nochtadh, do dhéanamh socrú maidir le cuntais páirtithe polaitíochta a iniúchadh agus do chur i ngníomh na moltaí a bhaineann le maoiniú polaitíochta atá sa Dara Tuarascáil ón mBinse Fiosrúcháin maidir le hÍocaíochtaí le Polaiteoirí
